entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
